This unique session combines the original teachings of mindfulness and loving-friendliness with cutting-edge neurofeedback technology from our partner, MUSE ‚Äî a world leader in meditation headbands that measure and train your brain's calm and focus in real time.

The Rain drops Mindfulness Experience

Each guest at Rain Drops is offered a complimentary 1-hour session during their stay - a personalized journey designed to quiet the mind, open the heart, and synchronize the brain with nature's stillness. Session Highlights
